rooms.name: Foyer
rooms.description: You are in the foyer of a small white house. You can go east to the dining room or west to the living room. There is a cellar door to your north; it is locked.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: You are in the tidy living room. There is a piano. You can go east to the foyer.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: You are in the dining room. The table is set for a lavish meal. There is a rusty key on the table. You can go west to the foyer.

items.result: You take the rusty key and put it in your pocket.

rooms.name: Cellar
rooms.description: You are in the cellar. It is so cold...there's a letter on the ground
